Topic.Title: Released my first game : skin a gentle blue

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I just published my first text game. It's a puzzle horror game where you explore the pages of an old religious text. Thank you to all of the people who helped me with my many questions in the forums for making this happen. 

here's the link :

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/r7rskop3re_jq4djkec1yq/skin-a-gentle-blue

https://cconstant.itch.io/skin-a-gentle-blue

--constant
